Contributor: Heywood Strasser & Voigt Litho. Co., printer, lithographer.;
Note: Date based on America's participation in the war.           "2C" appears on the bottom left of poster. Orientation:  Vertical.
Description: Text tells about the spirit of war camp community service. Illustration shows a woman helping to sign up many servicemen for invitations to homes and for entertainment.
